title: Listary v4.23.1728
description:
Listary v4.23.1728

(please make sure you block the application from connection to the internet, using a firewall)

The Fabulous search utility

Keep files at your fingertips

Listary is a unique search utility for Windows. 
Not only does it make file browsing truly flexible -- 
thanks to its multi-file managers support -- 
but the ultra-compact UI also redefines minimalism. 
The lightweight design doesn't stop it from providing various advanced features however, 
that may fit the needs of both casual and power users alike. 
All you have to do is just type the file name that youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re looking for, 
and Listary will display the search results at breakneck speed.


Find As You Type
The blistering fast Ã¢â‚¬ËœFind As You TypeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ ensures that instead of typing complete item names, 
you only input any part of the file or folder that youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re looking for, 
and let Listary highlight the results that seem relevant to your query.
[img]http://www.listary.com/wp-content/uploads/find-as-you-type-explorer.png[/img]

Projects
Projects lets you instantly search for files or folders that are stored within a particular directory 
no matter wherever you are.
[img]http://www.listary.com/wp-content/uploads/projects-search.png[/img]

Disk Search
The lightning fast Disk Search is probably the quickest way to access files from all your drives.
[img]http://www.listary.com/wp-content/uploads/disk-search-explorer.png[/img]

Actions
Who needs to open context menu separately when we have ListaryÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Actions for it?
[img]http://www.listary.com/wp-content/uploads/action-menu.png[/img]

Fuzzy Navigation
The intuitive Fuzzy Navigation is like a magic wand which is meant to dig up files, no matter where they reside.
[img]http://www.listary.com/wp-content/uploads/fuzzy-navigation1.png[/img]

Quick Switch
A big time-saver, which enables to directly hop onto any folder that youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re currently viewing in your file manager, 
in open or save dialog, or vice versa.
[img]http://www.listary.com/wp-content/uploads/quick-switch1.png[/img]

Favorites And History
Finding files in deeply nested folders can be quite a hassle. 
To avoid such tediousness, Listary lets you add folders as favorites, so you may jump straight to your items. 
In addition, the history act as a time machine to re-access your previously opened windows.
[img]http://www.listary.com/wp-content/uploads/favorite-folders.png[/img]

Commands
Commands gives you full control over Listary with just a single click or the use of hotkeys, 
which makes file handling painless.
[img]http://www.listary.com/wp-content/uploads/commands.png/[img]

Mouse
Mouse is an indispensable computer accessory, thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s why Listary knows its importance as much as you do.
[img]http://www.listary.com/wp-content/uploads/mouse.png[/img]


Learn More at http://www.listary.com/
